Posts.Content: Hi Dr Lim My wife has HER2 pos brain mets and leptomenginal . No cancer else where at the moment or in spine. TDM1 did not hold progression and she is on lapatinib and xeloda. Waiting scan to see if progression. She has had cyber knife and gamma knife and can have no more. She has not had WBRT. What would say is the next treatment to try it progression? And do you know if DS802 can cross the BBB? We are in the UK. Kind regards Jay
Posts.Title: Ask the Expert: Breast cancer oncologist Dr. Bora Lim returns
